3: Amy Amy, I'm Nanami!
Hm...? Why isn't Amy talking to Nanami?
...Don't talk to me.
Hm... but you can't install a beta lamp this way, let Nanami help you!
...Thank you.
Alright! Anything else you need help with? Nanami will help you solve it!
Wait, I can't throw you all my... Why are you helping me?
Because we're friends!
Get over yourself, I'm not your friend!
Umm... But that ol' pops said Nanami's everyone's new friend! I thought you all agreed so you stayed silent.
And, Commandant said that friends should help each other out!
I don't need friends, let alone a Construct friend.
...I don't want to force myself to forget someone again.
Wow! Amy, you can clear your memory data without doing a system reset?
I don't mean it like that, it's...!
If you can't reset it, then you can't forget it, right?
No, I can't...
Shove off, I have to handle the equipment for tomorrow.
Hm...? What's this?
Give it back!
Nanami's scanning system activates automatically. The music box was broken long before Nanami touched it.
The comb in the music box is stuck, that's why it's not making any sound.
...Can you...
Can you fix it?
Haha! You asked the right person! It's Nanami's time to shine!
But, who's Robert?
How did you know this name?
Um... If you read the comb teeth from their directional order in machine language...
It says 'Amy and Robert are friends forever.'
So, this music box has been singing 'Amy and Robert are friends forever...'
Until it got stuck!
To make a music box comb with such precision, hmmm... Is Robert also a Construct?
And... a little bit of this... and... done!
(Clank Clong)
This...
Well... since I don't know what Robert looks like, Nanami will just have to stand in for a while! Be friends forever with Robert!
And Nanami too! Nanami will be friends forever with Amy!
Friends...
